# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Special Instructions

{{instructions}}

# Solution 

```julia
function wrap_string(text::AbstractString, text_width::Integer=10)
    words = split(text)
    output = ""
    for (i, word) in enumerate(words)
        if i > 1 && length(output)+length(word)+1 > text_width # +1 for space between words
            output *= '\n'
        end
        output *= word*" "
    end
    return output
end
```

# Example

```julia
text = "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed aliquam turpis ac risus accumsan, eu eleifend ante dapibus. Nam sed mauris velit. Donec neque eros, scelerisque quis augue a, malesuada sollicitudin sapien."
wrap_string(text) # returns "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed aliquam turpis ac risus\n accumsan, eu eleifend ante dapibus. Nam sed mauris velit. Donec neque eros, scelerisque\n quis augue a, malesuada sollicitudin sapien."
```
